Greetings {!Referral__c.Referral_Account_Owner__c},
Your Contact {!Referral__c.Referred_Contact__c} has been sent to CompuCom on behalf of {!Referral__c.CreatedBy}.
CompuCom will be reaching out to {!Referral__c.CreatedBy} and this email is to notify you of this.Please facilitate any necessary communication with the referral creator to ensure he/she is well informed about the account.
Thank you,
Sales Enablement Team
